items.content_html: PrintCardify is a lightweight web application designed for printing cards with content on both sides. This application ensures that the content on both sides of the card is perfectly aligned when printed from the same location on a page.

items.content_html: Language Switcher (vls) is a lightweight gutenberg block module designed to facilitate language and region selection on your website. It provides a user-friendly modal window for users to choose their preferred language and region, seamlessly redirecting them to the selected content.
